name: Claude and the Phantom
description:
Created by Simon Reid for AdventureJam 2018, May 4th-18th 2018

Music composed by Maurício Costa

Hear more of Maurício's music here.

Claude runs a humble antiques shop in the quiet seaside town of Dastard's Cove. One Tuesday afternoon, he finds himself lumbered with a strange painting that turns out to be haunted. Before he knows it, he's helping a restless phantom escape from this earthly realm.
